response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This product, valued at $1,000,000 to you, holds immense potential for transforming various aspects of your business or personal life. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. I am confident that this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing you to secure it at a competitive advantage. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 1150000}
